results.description: Arbroath stun promotion-chasing Inverness CT with a thumping 3-0 win at Gayfield to move level on points with their opponents in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath stun promotion hopefuls Inverness
results.title: Arbroath 3-0 Inverness CT: hosts cruise to shock win

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle boss John Robertson says it is "unfair" to ask him about the vacant manager's position at former club Hearts.
results.shortTitle: Hearts job talk 'unfair' - Robertson
results.title: Hearts: Inverness CT boss John Robertson says speculation 'unfair'

results.description: Dundee United maintain their three-point lead in the Scottish Championship with an impressive three-goal victory against Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Dundee Utd win at Inverness to stay top
results.title: Inverness CT 0-3 Dundee Utd: Robbie Neilson's side stay top of Championship

results.description: Inverness CT manager John Robertson thinks the Scottish Championship title will not be decided by budgets despite the Dundee clubs' financial dominance.
results.shortTitle: Title 'not a battle of wage bills'
results.title: Inverness CT: Money will not decide Scottish Championship, says John Robertson

thumbnail.altText: Inverness Caledonian Thistle manager John Robertson

results.description: A system of testing former players for brain damage should be introduced by the Scottish FA and PFA Scotland, says Inverness Caledonian Thistle manager John Robertson.
results.shortTitle: Robertson calls for brain damage testing
results.title: John Robertson: Scottish FA & PFA should have brain damage testing

results.description: Inverness CT keep pace with title rivals Dundee United and Ayr United with a hard-fought victory over Queen of the South in Dumfries.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT keep pace with win at Queens
results.title: Queen of South 0-2 Inverness CT: Doran & Todorov earn win

results.description: Morton denies Inverness the chance to move second in the Scottish Championship after two goals from Bob McHugh's at Cappielow.
results.shortTitle: McHugh double as Morton beat Inverness
results.title: Greenock Morton 2-1 Inverness CT: Bob McHugh double for hosts

thumbnail.altText: Bob McHugh (right) celebrates his second goal for Morton

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle miss the chance to move top of the Scottish Championship as they concede an 89th-minute equaliser to Alloa Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Alloa deny Inverness CT chance to go top
results.title: Inverness CT 2-2 Alloa Athletic: Late equaliser costs hosts chance to go top

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle's quest for a third Challenge Cup success continues with a home quarter-final against Clyde.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT host Clyde in Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup quarter-final draw: Inverness CT at home to Clyde

thumbnail.altText: Partick Thistle travel to Stenhousemuir in the last eight

results.description: League Two Elgin City score two late goals to shock Airdrieonians and reach the quarter-finals of the Scottish Challenge Cup.
results.shortTitle: League Two pair reach last eight
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: League Two pair Stenhousemuir & Elgin City reach last eight

thumbnail.altText: Matheus Machado (right) celebrates his goal to make it 3-0 with David Carson

results.description: Inverness' Shaun Rooney goes from goal hero to photographer in their 2-0 win over Ayr United in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Any chance of a pic of the lads, Shaun?
results.title: Inverness goalscorer Shaun Rooney is asked by fans to take a photo of them

results.description: Manager-less Ayr United miss the chance to move top of the Scottish Championship as Inverness claim a deserved victory at Somerset Park.
results.shortTitle: Ayr miss chance to go top as ICT win
results.title: Ayr United 0-2 Inverness Caledonian Thistle: Hosts miss chance to go top

thumbnail.altText: James Vincent (centre) celebrates scoring for Inverness CT

results.description: Partick Thistle beat Inverness Caledonian Thistle to secure their first win of the Championship season in Ian McCall's first game as manager.
results.shortTitle: Partick win in McCall's first game
results.title: Inverness CT 1-3 Partick Thistle

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle chief executive Scot Gardiner says the club's academy could be in danger if fresh investment is not found.
results.shortTitle: Gardiner fears over Inverness finances
results.title: Inverness CT: Chief executive makes academy warning over fresh funds

results.description: Chairman Graham Rae and director Alan McPhee have resigned from their roles at Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Graham quits as Inverness CT chairman
results.title: Inverness Caledonian Thistle: Chairman Graham Rae and director Alan McPhee step down ahead of egm

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle remain just two points off the Scottish Championship summit following victory over Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Welsh & Walsh score as Inverness win
results.title: Inverness CT 2-0 Queen of the South: Welsh & Walsh score in win

results.description: Hearts' leading scorer will be given the honour at Hampden Park at the end of October.
results.shortTitle: Robertson to be inducted into Hall of Fame
results.title: John Robertson: Hearts legend to be inducted into Hall of Fame

results.description: Dunfermline Athletic remain bottom of the Scottish Championship after a late Sean Welsh penalty hoists Inverness Caledonian Thistle up to third.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT win at Pars to move third
results.title: Dunfermline Athletic 0-1 Inverness CT: Late Sean Welsh penalty sends visitors up to third

results.description: Inverness CT loanee Jack Brown scores the only goal as Fort William beat Clachnacuddin to secure a first Highland League victory in more than two years.
results.shortTitle: Fort end 74-game wait for league win
results.title: Fort William end 74-game, 882-day wait for Highland League win

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019
